body.name: ROVE R2-4K PRO Dash Cam, Built-in GPS, 5G WiFi Dash Camera for Cars, 2160P UHD 30fps Dashcam with APP, 2.4" IPS Screen, Night Vision, WDR, 150° Wide Angle, 24-Hr Parking Mode, Supports 512GB Max

features: 4K UHD RECORDING 2160P @30FPS / 2.5K @60FPS - ROVE R2-4K PRO Dash Cams is our newest and most advanced feature-packed super night vision 4k dash cam with all the bells and whistles needed in dashcams for cars this 2023.

PAIR YOUR SMARTPHONES WITH ADVANCED 5G WIFI - With our R2-4K PRO dash cam, you can connect your iOS or Android devices using the latest dual band 5G & 2.4GHz WIFI feature. With our advanced ROVE Dash Cam APP, you can easily view, download and share your best videos with your friends and family with just one click on social media or using any messenger. You can even set up all the settings of your dash camera within our app. We provide over-the-air firmware updates using our APP for free.

CAR CAM WITH GPS - R2-4K PRO has built-in GPS, which records and allows you to view real-time live speed and compass on the LCD. It records precise driving routes, locations, and speed stamps directly on the video as additional evidence.

FEATURES WITH STATE OF THE ART TECHNOLOGY - R2-4K PRO dashboard camera is a supercapacitor car camera (extends product life significantly), voice guidance and alerts, f1.5 aperture (allows more light capture for small details), time-lapse video, 150° wide angle 7-glass lens, emergency video lock, ring of threads for optional CPL filter, loop recording, G-Sensor, supports micro sd card up to 512GB (not Included, recommend ROVE memory card ASIN: B0BGV6W8QX).

Our 24/7 CUSTOM DESIGNED PARKING MODE: R2-4K PRO offers three options for its custom-designed 24-hour parking mode with voice guidance. 1fps timelapse video, motion detection, and collision detection. Hardwire kit is required (buy separately, ASIN: B0B7235VLX). If an event occurs in the park, then the camera will record a full 1-min video, lock it safely in an event folder, and give you a voice alert the next time you start your car letting you know that event has occurred while you were away.

100% USA-CHICAGO BASED CUSTOMER-CENTRIC COMPANY & CUSTOMER CARE – A full, hassle-free, 1-YEAR WARRANTY backs this car dash cam with app. You can text us for (Faster Response) or Email our customer care, and we will answer any of your questions and resolve arising issues fast. It comes with a FULL REFUND within 30 DAYS if you have any doubts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surpassed my expectations
reviews.reviewText: Pros: I like almost everything about this little cam. It has tons of features you can tinker with, but it also works right out of the box, just by plugging it in. Very little work to get it up and running. I also bought ROVE's memory card, which worked without any issue. The software and instructions/documentation are fantastic - very clear and well thought-out, which is rare for electronics these days, with most stuff being made overseas by folks who don't know English well. This camera is designed in the USA, manufactured in China - like Apple products. The unboxing experience was surprisingly fun, and obviously Apple-inspired. Build quality looks really solid - I see no flaws. Camera is very easy to mount. ROVE even included cleaning wipes for my windshield in the product packaging! It's little touches like this that show they put a lot of thought and care into this product. It's also really easy to get the videos onto my computer; I appreciate the no-hassle experience.?: I haven't tested the night vision yet. One other feature I'm excited to try is time lapse mode.Cons: The camera stops recording as soon as the engine is turned off. I understand why it is designed this way. But I want to be able to record while I'm pulled over with the engine off. For example, if a police officer pulls me over. Cops usually tell you to turn off your car engine. If you do that your camera shuts off and you'll have no footage! ROVE sells a kit that allows you to hook the camera up directly to your car battery, but I worry that will drain my battery; might be better for owners of electric vehicles. The other major flaw with this camera is that it only records the forward-facing direction; if someone rear-ends you, you won't have any footage of it (you'll need to buy a whole second camera for that). Finally, the built-in speedometer seems to be biased 1 or 2 mph too fast, imho. That's going to make you look bad if you try to use the videos in court - it makes you look like you were driving faster than you were! There ought to be a setting to tune this up or down 1-3 mph. Fortunately there is a setting to just turn it off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stays put, does its job
reviews.reviewText: Easy set up, clear monitor, and good for “just in case”. Some crazy drivers in Florida. This camera is a great quality and does its job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It arrived in a nice box and well packaged but you can tell it's a cheap product by the really odd wording on the box like "smart and beautiful rove app for IoS and android". The mount is really cheap too. The camera feels cheap like a 35 dollar dash cam I had prior. I'm willing to overlook that if it works when I need it to. I've owned Magellan dash cams, Garmin, Viofo and Azdome. Was really let down with all of them except for the Garmin, but that lacked image quality.The suction cup mount is a little bit more sturdy with less side to side flop. The image quality is good though, the app so far has worked well. Was easier to set up than some of the other dash cams I've used. I have high hopes for this one I picked it over the rexing because they kept talking about formatting in fat32 and I won't buy a camera that requires formatting on a computer in a different mode before being able to use it. Anyways I think the price for this should be in the $60 range

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SOLID, RELIABLE PERFORMANCE
reviews.reviewText: Summary: the R2-4K Pro is a straightforward 4K dashcam that does only that job but does it very well without extra bells or whistles. Easy to set up and use, good video and photo footage, solid apps, excellent customer service, and an attractive price point, especially for 4K. I am happy with my purchase and would recommend it to a friend.Key specifications and features: video up to true 4K ((3840 x 2160 @ 30 fps), photos up to 12Mb resolution, time lapse photos at 1, 2, and 4 fps, 150 degree field of view, 2 band wi-fi, GPS, and parking mode with G-sensor (cam “goes to sleep” when parked but records again if it detects motion or if something hits the car with sufficient force - note that this requires the optional hardwiring kit). This dashcam can’t connect to a second camera or upload videos or photos directly to the cloud. There are no safety features such as lane departure, collision, or speed trap warnings. Menus are logically arranged and easy to navigate. A micro SD card (up to 512 Gb capacity) is required to record and must be purchased separately. Rove recommends their proprietary card and warns against using SanDisk and Samsung cards.The cam comes with a 12 volt power cord, suction cup and adhesive mounts, with 2 sheets of electrostatic windshield film for use with the adhesive mount. The cam is adjustable vertically and horizontally. The user manual, 4.5" x 6" and printed in color, is reasonably well organized and has useful information, but, due to its size, some of the images are too small to read without a magnifying glass. The binding is weak; after less than a month, the pages are starting to separate. How-to info for the smartphone and desktop apps is marginal.I paid about $170 for the cam, a 256 Gb memory card, and circular polarizing filter. I installed it plugging the power cord into the car’s 12 volt power outlet. The cam turns on and begins recording automatically when the car starts but must be turned off manually. I haven’t hardwired the connection, so I can’t use the parking mode and G sensor features. I first set video resolution at 2K (2560 x1440) and then at 4K; photos at 12 Mb and time lapse at 4 fps. All settings gave what I consider useable footage in daylight. I did not see much difference between the 4K and 2K video, maybe because I do not have a 4K display. I have not used the camera yet during night driving. Playback is smooth and uninterrupted on the device and the smartphone and desktop apps. Settings are easily accessible from the camera while it is installed. The cam is easily disconnected from the mount. The connection points are plastic, so I wonder about durability and whether metal points would last longer. I’m not sure the filter was a good choice; its effectiveness changes as the camera’s angle to the sun changes which, of course, is constantly while driving.So far, customer support has been superb. Phone support is available but Rove encourages use of texts and emails. Rove has responded to each of my emails in less than 48 hours with on-topic information.
Esta es excelente a un buen precio, con wi fi y GPS y graba hasta 4 k ! Solo le falta la cámara trasera !!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Dashcam at an affordable price.
reviews.reviewText: I replaced a 5 year old premium dashcam with this Rove unit, and the difference in image quality was immediately noticeable! After a near accident, having been cut off by a Dodge Ram driver, I retrieved the video from the old unit and couldn’t read the offender’s licence number. After installing the Rove unit, reading licence plates is a piece of cake. Using the iPhone app to manage the camera is intuitive, and retrieving videos is extremely easy. All-in-all a great investment, and a very happy customer!

reviews.reviewTitle: Extremely easy to use and great quality
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic product, easy to set up. Easy to use. App seems to do everything the camera screen can let you do, so no options hidden in the app only. Gps is very accurate. Extremely fast boot up when I start the car.

reviews.reviewTitle: The suction will not hold on the windshield
reviews.reviewText: The dash cam worked well the only problem is that it would not stay on the window

La ROVE R2-4K PRO es excelente, la calidad de las imágenes que recopila es sin igual, su ángulo de visión 150°, Sensor-G, GPS, Conexión WIFI, Parking Mode y su Ultra-HD 4K, son sólo algunas de sus cualidades que la hacen superior a muchas otras Dashcams del mercado a un muy buen precio.
